feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:08 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -20.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 7:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -20.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -26.4°C
Wind: SSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening then changing to ice pellets after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
